channel.title: Homes on Pierce Donovan
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Pierce Donovan

item.description: About Me I’m an envrionmental economic theorist. I think that means that I enjoy studying environmental policy and math in equal amounts. My dissertation work focused on estimating the “missing demand curve” associated with the marginal social benefits of decreasing the risk of extinction, which subsequently teaches us about cost-effective species management and optimal population targets. I’m particularly excited about a new project in which I develop incentives that combat habitat fragmentation on lands currently controlled by many independent smallholders–you should ask me about it!
